articles.title: 'I'm here to be manager, not coach' - but will Amorim survive at Man Utd?
articles.summary: Ruben Amorim challenges Manchester United's board to let him do his job after Sunday's draw with Leeds, and says he intends to leave in 18 months' time.

articles.title: Rosenior deserves Chelsea chance, says Rooney
articles.summary: Wayne Rooney says Liam Rosenior is as good a coach as he has worked with and deserves the chance to be Chelsea manager.

articles.title: Can you name the Premier League's oldest ever players?
articles.summary: James Milner could make a Premier League appearance after his 40th birthday on Wednesday. Can you name the other 18 players to have done so?

articles.title: Rice, Watkins & Cunha make cut - FPL team of the week
articles.summary: Erling Haaland retains the captaincy despite his run of blanks but, if he fails to score against Brighton, FPL managers can start to panic.

articles.title: Martindale has Livingston owner's 'full support'
articles.summary: Livingston chairman Calvin Ford insists manager David Martindale has his "full support" despite the club's struggles this season.

articles.title: Rosenior as good a coach as I've ever worked with - Rooney
articles.summary: With Liam Rosenior in talks to fill the vacant manager's role at Chelsea, Wayne Rooney speaks on his former Derby County colleague and explains why he thinks Rosenior deserves to manage in the Premier...

articles.title: The man carrying the creative burden at Man Utd
articles.summary: Match of the Day pundit Gary O'Neil breaks down Matheus Cunha's solid performance for Manchester United and ultimate equaliser against Leeds United.

articles.title: Could Liverpool have stopped Reed's 'unbelievable' goal?
articles.summary: Match of the Day pundit Shay Given analyses Harrison Reed's superb late goal that rescued a point for Fulham as Gary O'Neil highlights his disappointment with Liverpool's defence.

articles.title: Ref Watch LIVE! Why Wirtz goal was given onside by VAR...
Nasser on Smith's dreadful dismissal: 'Someone needs to talk to him!'
articles.summary: Nasser Hussain says that someone needs to talk to Jamie Smith and Harry Brook after the match, after Smith gifted a wicket to Australia.

articles.title: Sesko's struggles in front of goal for Man Utd analysed
'I don't have a crystal ball' - damaging few days for Man City?
articles.summary: Chelsea's stoppage-time equaliser against Manchester City on a freezing Sunday evening at Etihad Stadium felt a monumental moment in the Premier League title race.

articles.title: 'I was sure it was offside' - why did Wirtz equaliser stand?
articles.summary: Florian Wirtz thought his goal for Liverpool in the 2-2 draw at Fulham was offside - so how did technology allow it to stand?

articles.title: 'Struggling Frank trapped in gilded cage at joyless Tottenham'
articles.summary: Struggling head coach Thomas Frank is trapped in a gilded cage at joyless Tottenham Hotspur, says chief football writer Phil McNulty.

articles.title: Thelin 'accepts' Aberdeen sacking after winless run
articles.summary: Aberdeen sack manager Jimmy Thelin following a five-match winless run and just eight months on from the club's Scottish Cup win.

articles.title: Taylor banned from PDC events and prize money removed after failed drugs test

articles.title: Wrexham striker Mullin's Wigan loan cut short
articles.summary: Paul Mullin will return to the Stok Cae Ras this week after his season-long loan with League One Wigan Athletic was terminated early.
